name: HamiltonTech Capital Partners
overview: HamiltonTech Capital Partners is a venture capital firm specializing in investments in growth stage companies. The firm makes investment in the following areas: software infrastructure, hardware infrastructure, content and applications, and medical technology and convergent technologies. HamiltonTech Capital Partners, LP was founded in 2004 by Mr. Paul J. Bouchard and is headquartered at San Diego, California with an additional office in Irvine, California.

funding_round.source_description: Daylight Solutions Closes $7,500,000 Series A Financing
